text.section: In this Part II of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Annuity, sick pay, or retirement distribution" means:
an annuity or sick pay payment described in § 3402(o) of the Internal Revenue Code; or
a designated distribution as defined in § 3405(e) of the Internal Revenue Code other than an eligible rollover distribution within the meaning of § 3405(c) of the Internal Revenue Code.

section.section: "Employer" has the meaning stated in § 3401 of the Internal Revenue Code.
"Payor" means a person responsible to make a payment subject to withholding.

text.section:
"Wagering" includes:
any lottery, including the State lottery; and
any pari-mutuel wagering, including any pari-mutuel wagering conducted under Title 11 of the Business Regulation Article.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, "wages" means salary, wages, or compensation for personal services of any kind as defined in §§ 3401 and 3402(o)(2)(A) of the Internal Revenue Code.
"Wages" includes remuneration paid for services described in § 3401(a)(5) and (6) of the Internal Revenue Code.
